Self-guided Tour

Stroll GGC's picturesque campus using the self-guided tour map. Info Spots at each building's main entrance assist with more information.

GGC Self-guided Tour Map (PDF)

Ride Gwinnett Bus Route 45

Ride Gwinnett offers bus and microtransit services from GGC's campus to area shops, restaurants and medical resources via Northside Hospital Gwinnett and Sugarloaf Mills.

Find fares and scheduling for Ride Gwinnett Bus Route 45.

View interactive map for Ride Gwinnett Bus Route 45.

Learn more about Ride Gwinnett Microtransit.
